snippet: General Electric is promoting a line of refrigerators in a Web series where one refrigerator is hauled 2,000 miles on a pickup.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column observes that General Electric is promoting a line of refrigerators in a Web series where one refrigerator is hauled 2,000 miles on a pickup truck.
lead_paragraph: General Electric is promoting a line of refrigerators in a Web series where one refrigerator is hauled 2,000 miles on a pickup.

headline.seo: G.E. Teams With Chef for Web Series Promoting Its Refrigerators
headline.main: A Web Series for G.E. Tests a Refrigerator and Freshness
headline.print_headline: A Web Series For G.E. Tests A Refrigerator And Freshness
